sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of environmental event occurring in a region
message_1: A study has shown that the probability of a flood occurring in a particular region in the upcoming year is 0.2. What is the probability that a flood will not occur in that region in the upcoming year?
message_2: The probability of an event not occurring is equal to 1 minus the probability of the event occurring. In this case, the probability of a flood not occurring in the upcoming year is 1 - 0.2 = 0.8 or 80%.
